org.whitesource.api.client
Interface WssServiceClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
WssServiceClientImpl
public interface WssServiceClient

The interface describes the functionality to be exposed by a client implementation to the WhiteSource agent service.

Author:
Edo.Shor, Tom.Shapira

Method Summary
 PropertiesResult getProperties(PropertiesRequest request)
          The method calls the WhiteSource service for properties.
 ReportResult getReport(ReportRequest request)
          The method calls the WhiteSource service for dependency analysis report.
 void setProxy(String host, int port, String username, String password)
          The method configure the client to use a proxy specified by the given parameters.
 void shutdown()
          The method close all connections and release resources.
 UpdateInventoryResult updateInventory(UpdateInventoryRequest request)
          The method calls the WhiteSource service for inventory update.
 

Method Detail

getProperties

PropertiesResult getProperties(PropertiesRequest request)
                               throws WssServiceException
The method calls the WhiteSource service for properties.

Parameters:
request - Properties request.
Returns:
Properties result.
Throws:
WssServiceException - In case an error occurred during the call to White Source server.

updateInventory

UpdateInventoryResult updateInventory(UpdateInventoryRequest request)
                                      throws WssServiceException
The method calls the WhiteSource service for inventory update.

Parameters:
request - Inventory update request.
Returns:
Inventory update result.
Throws:
WssServiceException - In case an error occurred during the call to White Source server.

getReport

ReportResult getReport(ReportRequest request)
                       throws WssServiceException
The method calls the WhiteSource service for dependency analysis report.

Parameters:
request - Report request.
Returns:
Report result.
Throws:
WssServiceException - In case an error occurred during the call to White Source server.

shutdown

void shutdown()
The method close all connections and release resources. No communication can be done on this client after the method is invoked.

setProxy

void setProxy(String host,
              int port,
              String username,
              String password)
The method configure the client to use a proxy specified by the given parameters.

Parameters:
host - Proxy host address.
port - Proxy port.
username - Optional. Proxy username.
password - Optional. Proxy password.
